name: Exodus Games
description:
Try to match any two cards in this card memory game by clicking on them. If the cards line up, you'll gain 100 points and an additional 2 seconds to your time.

Play and have fun while trying to get the highest score!

Every time the timer expires, the game's save system automatically saves the game.

Please keep in mind that this Fiverr project had specific requirements and does not fully represent my entire skill set.

If you could leave a review, that would mean the world to me.

Please tell me your score in the comments below!!

Icon artist - Ludgy Michel.
